desc: Custom, personalized, and meaningful handcrafted products for everyone and all occasions

layout.text:
serendipity • \sair-un-DIP-uh-tee\ • noun
An aptitude of making desirable discoveries by accident
―
serendibetty • \sair-un-DIB-eh-tee\ • noun
The making and creating of custom, personalized, and meaningful handcrafts to honor those serendipitous moments
